entry.title: Supreme - Whole Dill Pickle - 20 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Supreme
Type: FOOD
Price: 42.99

Serve your customers these Best Quality Pickles Crave to their Taste!

Bold and bursting with flavor, these pickles  deliver just the right amount of tang to accentuate any dish! Perfect for any restaurant, deli, food truck, or bar, these pickles offer the characteristic sweet-and-sour bite and fresh, crunchy texture that your customers crave. Each jar of pickles harvested at the peak of ripeness and packaged in a perfectly seasoned, all-natural brine to ensure exceptional quality. As a result, each pickle is packed with a robust, garlic-laced dill flavor, making them the perfect finishing touch to your hearty cold-cut subs or as a side to your thick, juicy burgers and signature fried chicken wings.

These juicy pickles are cut into consistent, perfectly portioned sandwich-sized slices for maximum convenience and immediate service. While these are great as a standalone snack or for serving on your artfully crafted artisan sandwiches, the possibilities are endless! Offer pickles on your appetizer or bar bites menu, add them to your cheeseboard or charcuterie, or create a delicious pickle pasta salad. As a long-time foodie favorite, these pickles also make an excellent addition to the selection of specialty food items in your boutique grocery store or gourmet food market. Your customers are sure to love the crisp, satisfying taste of these pickles!

entry.title: Cedar Creek - Garlic Sauce - 375 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cedar Creek
Type: FOOD
Price: 5.99

Cedar Creek - Garlic Sauce - 375 g

Garlic sauce is a sauce prepared using garlic as a primary ingredient. It is typically a pungent sauce, with the depth of garlic flavor determined by the amount of garlic used. The garlic is typically crushed or finely diced. Simple garlic sauce is composed of garlic and another ingredient to suspend the tuber via emulsion, such as oil, butter or mayonnaise. Various additional ingredients can be used to prepare the sauce.

Garlic sauce can be used to add flavor to many foods and dishes, such as steak, fish, seafood, mutton, chops, chicken, eggs and vegetables. It is also used as a condiment.

Delmare - Chopped Garlic In Oil - 8 Kg

We offer a variety of Garlic Products, spreads and purees to enhance every palate. Many of our products are available in pureed form, to facilitate the bulk inclusion of these ingredients in recipes for food production or preparation. Each pureed product has a unique flavour that can be used to satisfy the taste of the discerning consumer. Belle Donne Spices - Jalapeno Peppers Dried - 475 g

Try adding this spice to salsa, sauces, taco or your authentic cuisines for extra flavor, or allow guests to season their own meals via front-of-house condiment stations. Whether you run a Mexican or Indian restaurant, pizzeria, or upscale bistro, this spice is sure to take your food to the next level.

Its a pantry staple that can be used in marinades, tomato-based sauces, and soups. Whether you own a pizzeria, Italian restaurant, or upscale bistro, this spice is the perfect addition to all of your favorite menu items.

The unique and delicious flavor and aroma is commonly used in Asian, Middle Eastern, Latin American, and Italian cuisines. However, it also works well with traditional Canadian and American dishes.

The Available bulk packing of spices is a cost-efficient option for high-volume kitchens and can easily be portioned into smaller quantities. Dehydrated spices also last longer than fresh ingredients and are easier to store, making them the perfect addition to any busy, high-output kitchen.

entry.title: Frangiulia - Baresana Olives - 1.7 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Frangiulia
Type: FOOD
Price: 9.99

Frangiulia - Baresana Olives - 1.7 L

Olives are one of the world's most widely enjoyed foods. Olives can be added to salads, meat and poultry dishes and, of course, pizza.

One single olive contains calcium and iron, Vitamins A&C and E. Research studies have also shown that the monounsaturated fat found in olives can help to decrease blood pressure.

Delicious, Versatile Ingredient

Olives are firm in texture, sweeter and nuttier in comparison to green olives, and a popularly used in Greek and Italian dishes. They are great for topping pizzas, subs, and salads, incorporating them into pasta dishes, or blending up as part of tangy and sweet vinaigrettes or tapenades. Olives taste great when paired with sundried tomatoes, roasted red peppers, artichokes, and feta cheese.

entry.title: Unico - Stuffed Manzanilla Olives - 6 x 2 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Unico
Type: FOOD
Price: 57.99

Details

Bring a fresh taste to any salad, vegetable platter, or drink with these manzanilla stuffed olives! Perfect for adding an extra zest of savory flavor to any dish, these manzanilla stuffed olives make a welcome addition to your sandwich shop, bar, or Italian restaurant. 


Manzanilla olives are light green in color with a firm texture. Featuring a slightly bitter and smoky taste, they undergo a process known as a "Spanish cure." During this curing process, the olives are thoroughly washed for 10-12 hours, then fermented for approximately three or four months. After all that time, each olive is sure to be cultivated to perfection!

From classic martinis and Greek salads to pasta and tapas, these large stuffed manzanilla olives will be the ideal addition to any recipe. Use them to enhance your olive bar, salad bar, pasta salads, and flatbreads! A simple yet fresh product, they can often be found in martini glasses during cocktail hour. These manzanilla stuffed cocktail olives offer the perfect finishing touch to your meals and they are ready to serve.

Unico - Stuffed Manzanilla Olives - 2 L

entry.title: Cibona - Sour Pickled Onions - 4 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cibona
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 19.49

Cibona - Sour Onions - 4 L

Add a touch of class and sophistication to your establishment with these white pearl cocktail onions!

Delicate, bite-sized pearl onions are packed with brine and savory spices to create a delicious treat that's perfect for adding complex umami flavor to your cocktails and entrees. These alluring alliums have a mild onion flavor that is neither spicy nor pungent and is accompanied by salty overtones to bring out their rich savoriness!

Classic Cocktail Garnish

As their name implies, these onions are a perfect garnish to savory cocktails! Create a classic Gibson by combining 2.5 oz. of gin or vodka with 0.5 oz. vermouth in a mixing glass with ice. Stir and strain the contents into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with a couple of cocktail onions, and serve! They also make for a great addition to other savory martinis and Bloody Marys.

Versatile Ingredient

Don't be afraid to bring cocktail onions out from behind the bar! They make a great addition to charcuterie boards: serve them alongside thinly sliced meats, hard cheeses, and other pickled treats like pepperoncini and cornichons. You can also add a few to your salads for a zesty bite that your customers are sure to love! Try wrapping a cocktail onion with ground beef or pork to create a delightfully flavorful meatball, or even grilling them with roasted vegetables or on kebabs. No matter how you choose to present them, these cocktail onions are a versatile ingredient that's sure to become a favorite in your kitchen and bar!
